name: Computation
description:
Computation is a single-player sandbox game in which you can create seamless boolean(logic) circuits . The game features a wide variety of components  to use in your builds.

Features:

    - 4 individual save slots

    - Custom TexturePacks

    - 5 wire types

    - 7 logic gates (NOT, OR,  AND,  XOR,  XAND, NOR, NAND)

    - Touring completeness

This was our first game using C++ and SFML . We hope you like it!

Made by Ene Alexandru & Alexe Paul.
